title: Top Selling Handbags by Style
bodyText: The table below lists the top-selling handbag styles based on total sales. The data highlights the popularity of various handbag styles, with crossbody bags and tote bags being particularly prominent among the top sellers. This information can be useful for inventory planning and marketing strategies.
tableData:
| style_colour_desc                 |   sales |
|:----------------------------------|--------:|
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 46648 |     899 |
| Handbag Tote bag Style 37660      |     893 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 43477 |     822 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 40077 |     810 |
| Handbag Shopping Style 48629      |     808 |
| Handbag Clutch Style 45156        |     786 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 46672 |     761 |
| Handbag Tote bag Style 46834      |     756 |
| Handbag Shopping Style 45147      |     687 |
| Handbag Crossbody bag Style 46724 |     651 |
| Handbag Shopping Style 48575      |     646 |
| Handbag Backpack Style 46908      |     634 |
subhead: The top-selling handbags include various styles, with crossbody bags and tote bags leading in sales. This data can guide inventory and marketing decisions.
details: The data was derived from a dataset containing sales information for various handbag styles. The 'style_colour_desc' column was used to identify the handbag styles, and the 'sales' column provided the total sales figures. The handbags were ranked based on their total sales, and the top 12 styles were selected for this analysis.
recommendations: Consider increasing inventory for the top-selling styles, particularly crossbody and tote bags, to meet demand. Additionally, focus marketing efforts on these popular styles to maximize sales.
request_and_response_issues: The request was clear, and the data provided was sufficient to identify the top-selling handbag styles. No significant issues were encountered in the response process.
